tachyon.master.journal

Class JournalTailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.journal.JournalTailer

  • public final class JournalTailer
extends Object
    This class tails the journal for a master. It will process the journal checkpoint file, and then process all existing completed log files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JournalTailer(Master master, Journal journal) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkpointExists() 
      long getLatestSequenceNumber() 
      boolean isValid() 
      void processJournalCheckpoint(boolean applyToMaster)
      Loads and (optionally) processes the journal checkpoint file.
      int processNextJournalLogFiles()
      Processes all the next completed journal log files.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • JournalTailer

        public JournalTailer(Master master,
             Journal journal)
        Parameters:
        master - the master to apply the journal entries to
        journal - the journal to tail

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns:
        true if this tailer is valid, false otherwise

      • checkpointExists

        public boolean checkpointExists()
        Returns:
        true if the checkpoint exists

      • getLatestSequenceNumber

        public long getLatestSequenceNumber()
        Returns:
        the sequence number of the latest entry in the journal read so far

      • processJournalCheckpoint

        public void processJournalCheckpoint(boolean applyToMaster)
                              throws IOException
        Loads and (optionally) processes the journal checkpoint file.
        Parameters:
        applyToMaster - if true, apply all the checkpoint events to the master. Otherwise, simply open the checkpoint file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • processNextJournalLogFiles

        public int processNextJournalLogFiles()
                               throws IOException
        Processes all the next completed journal log files. This method will return when the next complete file is not found. processJournalCheckpoint(boolean) must have been called previously.
        Returns:
        the number of completed log files processed
        Throws:
        IOException
